title: Evaluation of Language Models in the Medical Context Under Resource-Constrained Settings
details: A Posada, D Rueckert, F Meissen, P Müller - arXiv preprint arXiv:2406.16611, 2024
abstract: Since the emergence of the Transformer architecture, language model development has increased, driven by their promising potential. However, releasing these models into production requires properly understanding their behavior, particularly in …
